alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 10 at 4:26AM AKST until February 10 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and gusty northeast winds will persist through this afternoon. The worst conditions and strongest winds are expected for Saint George, with falling snow expected to remain much lighter towards Saint Paul.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
